newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight-run fuel oil - low sulphur to the U.S.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight-run fuel oil - low sulphur to the U.S.

text.p: In quantity terms Friday saw a lot of activity although only a couple of deals were done. A trader was understood to have sold up to 60,000 tonnes in several parcels to the U.S. at a p&c price.

A 25,000 tonne Tunisian cargo was reported sold at $134 cif NWE, a figure seen to be several dollars above the market. "The seller will still hold 10-15kt and the deal is a trial - there could be more," said one trader.
High sulphur straight run saw an E-4 available at the end of next week at around formula +$3.50. A couple of M-100s were also due next week around mean of means +$4.50. -- +44 171 542 898
